definition: to sprout up/to flourish/(of war etc) to break out/rapid growth
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: One booming area is in virtual worlds.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬世界是一個蓬勃發展的領域。
這也是蓬勃發展的市場。

sentences.english: A variety of other rubber products manufacturing production has been booming development.
sentences.chinese: 其他各種橡膠製品製造生產已在蓬勃發展中。

sentences.english: The burgeoning of India and China's economic ties is important and welcome.
sentences.chinese: 印中經貿往來的蓬勃發展是重要而可喜的。

sentences.english: Mirs the Youth Pre-employment, A symbol of the vigorous development of the cause.
sentences.chinese: 大鵬展翅，象徵着事業的蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: Singing in chorus starts from the West and has become prosperously developed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 合唱起源於西方，而近年來亦在國內蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: Hawk says, current, we see the bitter fleabane break out of estate exhibit.
sentences.chinese: 霍克說，目前，我們看到房地產的蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: Everywhere there are meretricious actions and opportunism; everywhere there is an expectation of simple orders.
sentences.chinese: 到處勃發着浮華和機遇，到處期待着樸素的秩序。

sentences.english: Cultural market and cultural industries have boomed.
sentences.chinese: 文化市場和文化產業蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: In the recently 10-plus years, the booming tourism industry in China has prompted the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: All are testaments to China's dynamism and growth.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是中國蓬勃發展的見證。

sentences.english: Colorful spring of boundless energy, blooming with Pompon life.
sentences.chinese: 色彩斑斕的春天，蘊藏着無限活力，勃發着蓬蓬生機。

sentences.english: At present investment-security-fund industry is in rapid development stage.
sentences.chinese: 目前證券投資基金業正以星火燎原之勢蓬勃發展。

sentences.english: The development of the Tea-drink has provided Beverage Ludustry with a new avene and effectiveness.
sentences.chinese: 茶飲料的蓬勃發展給飲料市場帶來了新的契機和活力。

sentences.english: Flourished development of meat duck industry continuously expands Saifeiya industrial chain.
sentences.chinese: 肉鴨產業的蓬勃發展帶來了塞飛亞產業鏈的不斷延伸。
